channel.title: Code on Adrià Mitjavila Ventura
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Adrià Mitjavila Ventura

item.title: Code development
item.description: Repositories of code I have developped or contributed to p{text-align: justify;} Snakemake ATACseq Snakemake: Simple Snakemake pipeline for ATAC-seq data used in Pasini’s lab. ongoing R Packages crhomHMMviewR: ggplot2-based functions that draw heatmaps from ChromHMM output data. Shiny apps DPomics: shiny app designed to visualize omics data from the Pasini Lab (RNA-seq and ChIP-seq). ongoing DNAme: shiny app designed for learning purposes that converts a word to a DNA sequence.
